The bliss on this girl's face is stunning. I believe that Mon-Petit is one of the best authors of hentai literature. His brush strokes shows his mastery in the visual art forms as well. The story of two highschool sweethearts is a tell almost as old as time. It is 2018 and this story needs to be revamped to fit the modern era. Woman do not belong to anyone especially one man. Yui wants to be please emotionally and physically. Her childhood friend is for emotionally support, but he is lacking skills to pleasure her sexually. An older, wiser man is key for making this happen. The gentleman knows from years of pleasing woman exactly what she needs. This series shows that Mon-Petit understands what a woman needs and will continue for many years to come. I hope everyone on this site agrees that this will set the standard of childhood friend NTR.  So, please every favorite this masterpiece to show your love for this genre of hentai literature.
